nytimes.title: A Regal Beagle Seizes the Spotlight
nytimes.topComment: There are no doubts about it, these dogs are beautiful, and indeed there is much to be said about what each breed has as their characteristics. There is also much to report on the love of dogs, dedication, intrigue, and personalities of many involved...

nytimes.title: A Bloody Retreat From Debaltseve as Ukrainian Forces Suddenly Withdraw
nytimes.topComment: For journalistic accuracy, shouldn't the article use the correct terms "invading Russians" and "invading Russian army" rather than "separatists," which confuses the issue and is just a PC term for "Russian invaders?" The NY Times owes no courtesies t...
